alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 5:33PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Elko County through 600 PM PDT... At 532 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Oasis, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Silver Zone Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
